short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increases readability of websites by changing to easier-to-read fonts and adding visual enhancements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Cubility plugin is a software tool designed to make websites more accessible to people with disabilities. It works by adding features to a website that make it easier for users with disabilities to navigate and interact with the content. 

The plugin includes several features such as :-

Contrast Adjustment
Text Colors
Background Colors
Overlays & Tints
Content Scaling
Highlight Titles
Text Alignment
Font Size
Paragraph Width
Line Height
Highlight Paragraphs
Letter Spacing
Text Magnifier
Word Spacing
Highlight Links
Readable Font
Big Cursors (Black & White)
Reader Mode
Hide Images
Reading Guide
Image Description
Reading Mask
Auto Scroll

It also includes features that make it easier for users with visual impairments to access and navigate the website, such as screen reader compatibility and the ability to adjust color schemes. 

The Cubility plugin can be installed on a website to make it more accessible to a wider range of users. By using this plugin, website owners can ensure that their content is accessible to everyone, regardless of their physical abilities or disabilities.


Data Protection FAQ:
* Does the extension collect any user data?
** No, Cubility does not collect any kind of user data.

* Does the extension track users?
** No, Cubility does not track users.

* Does the extension send data to any server?
** No, Cubility does not use any kind of server connection and does not send data to any server. All the processing is done locally.

* Why does the extension need 'read and change websites' permission?
** Because the Cubility needs the information of website elements to calculate and render styles.
